income_messages:
From: u*************************2@aol.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-20 22:41:49
SUBJECT: ATTN: Beneficiary,
ATTN: Beneficiary,
Precisely five months back, I was ask to confiscate some payment that has not been claim for years now ,your name was discovered as next on the list of the
outstanding contractors who have not yet received their payments and a draft contract sum to the tone of Two Million United States Dollars (US $4,000,000.00).
I got a mail from someone in your country but with a different email and he claim to be your lawyer that you ask him to claim the money on your behalf, i
thought i should contact you since your information is here to know if you actually ask him to come and claim the funds on your behalf.
Kindly re-confirm to me the followings:
(1) Your full name:
(2) Phone, fax and mobile #:
(3) Company's name,position and address:
(4) Profession, age and marital status:
(5) 
Copy of int'l passport or any scanned identity to
prove yourself
.
Once this is done then i will tell you the next step, please bear in mind that
 we do not have much time so that we don't confiscate your money.
Regards,
Sam Mcknight
Executive Director
UN Office,
United Kingdom.
From: u*************************2@aol.com
To: o*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-02-21 02:54:15
SUBJECT: Hope to hear from ASAP
Hello Lydia,
  Read my previous mail again and do exactly as I instructed if you want further discussions.
Awaiting your answer now.
Regards,Mr. Sam Mcknight Executive Director UN office,United Kingdom
From: u*************************2@aol.com
To: o*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-02-21 05:28:04
SUBJECT: Kindly re-confirm to me the followings:
Hello Lydia,
  I have told you what you need to do, first we have to verify you if you are actually the rightful owner of the funds sum of $4,000,000 or not, because someone claim to be your lawyer and wanted to claim your funds on your behalf and that is why we ask you to fill in the details below to verify you with the details we have with us to know if you are the owner of the funds.
Kindly re-confirm to me the followings:
(1) Your full name:
(2) Phone, fax and mobile #:
(3) Company's name,position and address:
(4) Profession, age and marital status:
(5) Copy of int'l passport or any scanned identity to
prove yourself.
Once this is done then i will tell you the next step, please bear in mind that we do not have much time so that we don't confiscate your money.
Also bear in mind that as you will be the one to take care of the transfer charges your self, and that all you have to do.
Regards,
Sam Mcknight
Executive Director
UN Office,
United Kingdom.
From: u*************************2@aol.com
To: o*****4@mail.wltechinc.top
Time: 2023-02-21 16:21:54
SUBJECT: Fill in your details that is what I need from you
Hello Lydia,
  I don’t think you are the rightful owner of the funds because I have explain to you more than enough but you still don’t wanna answer me please fill the form below.
This is what I need from you fill in your details.
Kindly re-confirm to me the followings:
(1) Your full name:
(2) Phone, fax and mobile #:
(3) Company's name,position and address:
(4) Profession, age and marital status:
(5) Copy of int'l passport or any scanned identity to
prove yourself.
Once this is done then i will tell you the next step, please bear in mind that we do not have much time so that we don't confiscate your money.
Also bear in mind that as you will be the one to take care of the transfer charges your self, and that all you have to do.
Regards,
Sam Mcknight
Executive Director
UN Office,
United Kingdom.
